parameters.name: connectInstanceURL
parameters.description: Amazon Connect instance URL that solution will use. For example: https://connect-instance-alias.my.connect.aws (or https://connect-instance-alias.awsapps.com)

parameters.name: connectInstanceRegion
parameters.description: Amazon Connect instance Region that solution will use. For example: us-east-1

parameters.name: transcribeRegion
parameters.description: Amazon Transcribe Region that solution will use. For example: us-east-1

parameters.name: translateRegion
parameters.description: Amazon Translate Region that solution will use. For example: us-east-1

parameters.name: translateProxyEnabled
parameters.description: When enabled, webapp requests to Amazon Translate are proxied through Amazon Cloudfront (recommended to avoid CORS)

parameters.name: pollyRegion
parameters.description: Amazon Polly Region that solution will use. For example: us-east-1

parameters.name: pollyProxyEnabled
parameters.description: When enabled, webapp requests to Amazon Polly are proxied through Amazon Cloudfront (recommended to avoid CORS)
